pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a brief, upward-tilting shot of a modern country-style kitchen. The scene centers on a dark blue range cooker set between light-colored cabinets with wooden countertops. The backsplash is made of distinctive, wavy white subway tiles.
